tool_description:
API for getting random indexes for Slot reels to stop on after spinning the reels.
This API is based on a random selection of symbols and also provides the capability of providing frequencies with which every symbol can appear at the landing index.
A customizable number of reels. This API can run for any number of reels provided in the input.
name: Slots Machine Reels Landing
title: Slots Machine Reels Landing

api_list.name: Get Stops For Reels
api_list.description:
This is for getting stops for reels in the slot machine.
/3 is the number of reels.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://slots-machine-reels-landing.p.rapidapi.com/getStopsForReels/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "slots-machine-reels-landing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://slots-machine-reels-landing.p.rapidapi.com/getStopsForReels/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "slots-machine-reels-landing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
